data.actual_result: The ends of the name get cut off
data.expected_result: The nickname should all fit on the screen, either by wrapping to multiple lines or by making the popup wider
data.short_description: In the role and notes profile viewer, long nicknames or usernames get cut off
data.steps_to_repro: - set your nickname (or someone else's) to a long one that's under 33 chars, for example `TheLordofGaming/TheLordofHTMLhi` - click yourself/them in the user list
